definition: pressure crease/fig. to toil for sb else's benefit/line ball (i.e. on the line)
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The high tension line inside the village uses unified string to divide each, cannot traverse a house owned by a citizen.
sentences.chinese: 村內高壓線使用統一的線杆分到各戶，不能橫穿民房。

sentences.english: Then I looked again and saw that it was in.
sentences.chinese: 然後我再看了一遍，看到果然是壓線。

sentences.english: This algorithm can draw isobar accurately.
sentences.chinese: 該算法可精確地繪製出等壓線。

sentences.english: As an example, the isobars are plotted for strong detonation waves passing over a wedge surface.
sentences.chinese: 作爲例子，文中計算了強爆震波繞薄楔時的等壓線。

sentences.english: Pressure differences are indicated on weather maps by isobars.
sentences.chinese: 在氣象圖上氣壓差用等壓線表示。

sentences.english: I saw the ball land on the line. So please go back and show the flag signal of ball "in".
sentences.chinese: 我看清楚球是壓線，所以請你回去出示界內球旗示。

sentences.english: Onto a high-voltage line, rebuke a row of apartments.
sentences.chinese: 飛到高壓線上，衝着一排公寓訓話。

sentences.english: There are climbing high line want back wages, it really is just a joke?
sentences.chinese: 還有爬高壓線想要回工錢，難道真的僅是一場兒戲？

sentences.english: A region of low pressure with roughly concentric isobars is known technically as a cyclone .
sentences.chinese: 具有大致同心的等壓線的低壓區在技術上稱爲氣旋。

sentences.english: I ask her again, isn't it also beautiful when he spurts forward to the line?
sentences.chinese: 我反問道，劉翔壓線衝刺的姿勢不帥嗎？

sentences.english: A PYLON is supposed to be a beautiful thing.
sentences.chinese: 如今高壓線塔被認爲是一道亮麗的風景。

sentences.english: Single-stranded copper core can be provided fire retardant safety wire joint or tin coat.
sentences.chinese: 單股銅芯線可採用阻燃型安全壓線帽或刷錫。

sentences.english: No citizen should touch the high-voltage wire of the law.
sentences.chinese: 每個公民都不應觸動法律這條高壓線。

sentences.english: The atmosphere pressure gradient is an inverse measure of the spacing of the isobars on a weather map.
sentences.chinese: 氣壓梯度與天氣圖上等壓線的間隔大小成反比。

definition: the spongy, white pulp inside the stem of rush plants, used as a wick for oil lamps
the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
